    com.mongodb.ReadPreferenceHedgeOptions
    As of MongoDB 8.1, the server ignores the option and periodically logs a warning

  • Deprecated Fields
    Field
    Description
    com.mongodb.MongoNamespace.COMMAND_COLLECTION_NAME
    there is no replacement for this constant, as it is only needed for the OP_QUERY wire protocol message, which has been replaced by OP_MSG

    Constructor
    Description
    com.mongodb.event.ServerHeartbeatStartedEvent(ConnectionId)
    Prefer ServerHeartbeatStartedEvent(ConnectionId, boolean). If this constructor is used then ServerHeartbeatStartedEvent.isAwaited() is false.
    com.mongodb.MongoWriteConcernException(WriteConcernError, ServerAddress)
